column4: how on earth do i install this on ubuntu http://forms.helixcommunity.org/helix/builds/?category=realplay-current
im trying but cant get it to work
what are you trying to install?
realplayer
Oh, been through that.
yes me too, with gutsy, but now i forgot how i did it
Ok, I do not really remember, but I downloaded Real Player through the Real Player Website.
yes but i want the nightly, you can fast forward better with that one
Hmm, ok. Did you try to download .bin version?
download the .bin version. it is way easier to install =]
yes i tried, but i cant seem to get it to execute
Hmm, did u give it permission to execute? I mean, did u make it exectable?
yes i think so
u think so? :p
make it executable then try and run it =]
yes i "think" so, cause nothing happened :) but i did chmod it
Ok, to be sure, find the .bin file and right click and go to Propertis.
this is what i have been doing: ~/Desktop$ chmod a+x real.bin
/Desktop$ sudo real.bin
that didnt work so i downloaded the tar file, unpacked it, yes i know its an archive amenado, then i tried the bin file in that one as well
ok cuz i was never really good with the terminal stuff, please do in the terminal: sudo nautilus /home/user/Desktop
then, find the realplaer .bin gile and right click -> propertis and check if it is marked as execuatable =]
im giving up, too tired, thnx anyway
Lol, ok. Sorry for not being able to help you. =[
